job.title: Senior Systems Administrator

this position requires technical acumen customer focus and a personable professional and collaborative style to solve a range of issues the focus of this position will be on the development of software and automation for our exhibits and mobile devices the senior systems administratordevops engineer is also responsible for the core network that runs our public and staffrelated systems including a wide range of cisco equipment our macbased exhibit technology av systems ip phone system comcast broadband routing and switching failover and redundancy technologies and our internal
